ThingDef.label: dlt-19x targeting blaster
ThingDef.description: The DLT-19x targeting blaster was a blaster rifle, and a variation of the DLT-19 heavy blaster rifle. Unlike the DLT-19, the DLT-19x released all of its power in one shot before it would need to cool down. The DLT-19x was an incredibly powerful weapon, and could take down most enemies in one shot. The weapon had a scope which could be zoomed in farther than most scopes. This targeting blaster was silent and effective, and as such, was a weapon of choice for many snipers, and the primary weapon for some Imperial sharpshooters. The LOM-series bounty hunter 4-LOM also wielded a DLT-19x.
